title: Patient-Reported Outcomes in Older Adults With Transthyretin Amyloid Cardiomyopathy - JACC

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: PROs can improve shared decision-making, treatment escalation, and assessment of response; EQ-5D-5 L and MLHFQ predictive of all-cause mortality in ATTR-CM.
**TACTICAL WIN**: [SHIP NOW] Implement ePRO solutions that incorporate validated questionnaires like KCCQ and EQ-5D-5 L to capture full patient experience in ATTR-CM trials.
